verbose_text: Thirdly, although the present study assessed the therapeutic implications of EGb pretreatment on GluN2B expression, we also suggested a potential mechanism that might be associated with salicylate induced ototoxicity, including Na + or Ca 2+ overload and proinflammatory cytokine release [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
